OOC: Ok, the part with Hot Rod and Skulletron in my last post is void.

::Hot Rod::

He was surprized to here the voice of his... daughter.
He opened a comm to her.
"Hey, its good to hear from you." he said, useing his charming voice.
Then he switched to his gruff, evil voice.
"Now you will DIE!!!!!!"
